meaning_str.bing:
n. 桥；桥梁；桥牌；舰桥
v. 在…上架桥
网络. 桥接；网桥；桥接器

桥；桥梁；<比喻>纽带；连接物；（轮船的）船桥；舰桥；驾驶台；桥楼；桥牌；（眼镜的）鼻梁架；鼻梁；（乐器的）琴马；假牙；齿桥；（歌曲的）过渡乐节；间奏；（Bridge）布里奇（人名）
在…之间架桥；横跨；把…联结；把…弥合

1.en: At this point, the reasons should be sought to bridge the cracks, not to allow development to out of hand.
1.cn: 此时，应寻找原因，弥合裂缝，不要使其发展到不可收拾的地步。

2.en: It put up a platform for us to let the world know us; it for the construction of a bridge, let us better communicate with the world.
2.cn: 它为我们搭起了平台，让世界了解我们；它为我们建造了桥梁，让我们与世界更好地沟通。

3.en: Wayne Bridge has set his stall out to be a regular starter in the new season, but is unsure of his long-term future.
3.cn: 维恩。布里奇已经为新赛季能够首发打的上比赛提出勒转会申请，的未来却不太明朗。

0.en: The Decepticons must never know the space bridge is here.
0.cn: 绝不能让霸天虎知道空间桥在这里。

1.en: You can open your eyes now. Are we off the bridge? Yes!
1.cn: 现在可以睁开眼睛了。下桥了吗？下了！

2.en: Well, actually, a bridge has two sides. And Mother had two daughters.
2.cn: 事实上，桥有两头，而母亲有两个女儿。

3.en: Across the bridge to your right, you will see L 'Artisan Parfumeur.
3.cn: 右手边那座桥的对岸，你会看到阿蒂仙香水店。

4.en: There was a guy, Horatius, held the bridge alone against a whole army.
4.cn: 有一个叫赫雷修斯的人，独守一座桥对抗整个军队。

5.en: Oh, the boat is moving backwards. Watch out for the bridge. Oops. Oh, that was close.
5.cn: 噢，船在向后行驶。小心这座桥呀。差点就撞上了。

6.en: It is the ability to reshape the universe. Together the pillars form a space bridge.
6.cn: 它具有重塑宇宙的能力，集结所有传送柱就能形成空间桥。

7.en: And that, you know, it didn't sound like a real movie. Okay, he should've pushed me off of the bridge.
7.cn: 说这部电影不像是真的，好啦，他该把我推下桥才对。

8.en: But you don't need to work on the bridge to enjoy the views from the top, simply strap on a safety harness and join a Bridge Climb Tour.
8.cn: 您当然不需要在桥上工作就可以从高处欣赏美景，只需简单系上安全带，并参加攀登大桥之旅便可。

9.en: Alright, sea-dog! Let's race to the next bridge! On the count of three. One... Two… GO!
9.cn: 那好吧，海狗！我们就来比赛！看谁先到下一座桥！数到三就开始，一...二...开始！

10.en: Hector. Hector? She's forgetting me. Who? My daughter. She's the reason you wanted to cross the bridge.
10.cn: 埃克托，埃克托。她快忘掉我了。谁？我的女儿。就是为了她，你才想走过那座桥的吧？

11.en: Grandpa Pig is going to moor the boat. The secret of mooring is to do it carefully. My, the bridge. What? Look behind you. Ah.
11.cn: 猪爷爷要把船给拴住。拴船的秘诀就在于要非常地小心。小心那座桥，小心你的？后面啊！

12.en: It's located at one end of a 34-kilometre bridge, on an island in the open sea which was razed to build a freshwater port.
12.cn: 一座34公里长的桥连接着这个城市，其所在地曾是远海上一座岛 后被人类夷平了来建淡水港。

13.en: I just can't side with her this time. This time we just can't go into candy cane world. We can't just go skipping over the rainbow bridge with our underwear on our head.
13.cn: 我这次真的没办法站在她那边。这一次我们没办法走进拐杖糖世界，我们没办法把内裤顶在头上滑过彩虹桥。

14.en: Here's a woman who describes her vows as a suicide flirting with a bridge's edge. And a man who wears his wedding ring as a badge of shame, for the debutante deserved more.
14.cn: 这个女人将自己的婚誓比作在桥边犹豫自杀的徘徊，和一个将婚戒当作羞耻徽章的男人，因为他觉得配不上这位名媛。

15.en: What are they targeting? Spirit of Detroit, Ambassador Bridge, Livingstone Lighthouse, Belle Isle Fountain, Wayne County Building. All historic landmarks on Belle Isle and downtown.
15.cn: 他们的目标是哪里？"底特律精神"雕塑，大使桥利文斯灯塔，贝尔岛喷泉，韦恩县大厦，都是百丽岛和市区的历史地标。

16.en: Look, I don't want to fight about it. I just want you to make it right. Miguel can put my photo up. Hector. And I can cross over the bridge. I could see my girl.
16.cn: 听着，我并不想纠结这个不放，我只想你帮我一下，米格尔可以把我的照片放上灵台。埃克托。然后，我就可以走过那座桥就可以去看我的女儿。

17.en: Joey kicked me out of the car on the George Washington bridge. Why?
17.cn: 乔伊在大桥上把我赶下车。为什么？

18.en: I'll make this quick. Target all aft torpedoes on the Enterprise bridge.
18.cn: 我会给你们个痛快的，将所有鱼雷对准企业号舰桥。

19.en: We'll seal the bridge and the reactor room. Everywhere else will go vacuo.
19.cn: 我们可以密封好栈桥和反应室，其他所有地方都变真空。
